sentences.en: A regional conflict would erupt into violent warfare.
sentences.cn: 地区性冲突会演变成一场大战.

sentences.en: Above all, the warfare of Hester's spirit at that epoch was perpetuated in Pearl.
sentences.cn: 而最主要的是, 当时海丝特的好斗精神也永远注入了珠儿的身心.

sentences.en: Celerity is the soul of warfare

sentences.cn: 他对游击战嗤之以鼻，认为那是一种“冒险主义”。

sentences.en: He dwelt only on the devices of the sort of warfare.
sentences.cn: 他一心盘算着应付这场斗争的策略.

sentences.en: He watched the canine warfare with the deepest interest.
sentences.cn: 他极有兴趣地观看斗狗.

sentences.en: Metal - wheeled chariots are the prototype of the tanks of modern warfare.
sentences.cn: 金属轮战车是现代战争中坦克的原型.

sentences.en: Mobility is very important in guerrilla warfare.
sentences.cn: 机动性在游击战中至关重要.

sentences.en: Much of the violence is related to drugs and gang warfare.
sentences.cn: 大多数暴力事件都与吸毒和群殴有关。

sentences.en: The dreadful , haunting fear of nuclear warfare casts a sobering pall over all international relations.
sentences.cn: 经常出现的对于核战争的恐惧在一切国际关系上投下了一道愁人的阴影.

sentences.en: The international level sport is frankly mimic warfare.
sentences.cn: 坦率地说,国际范围的运动就是一场模拟战争.

sentences.en: The land was subjected to perpetual warfare.
sentences.cn: 在这块土地上,战争连绵不断.

sentences.en: These clashes could develop into open warfare.
sentences.cn: 这些冲突可能会发展成为公开的战争。

sentences.en: They are relatively immune to hazards of nuclear warfare.
sentences.cn: 它们相对地免受核战争的危险.

sentences.en: They are waging warfare with drought.

words.tran_cn: 战争的；好战的；有战争危险的
